Title: Men Watching Herons in Flight
Medium: ink and pigments on thick paper
Description: This folio from Walters manuscript W.652 depicts men watching herons in flight.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Book; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Afghanistan; Cosmology; History; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Husayn, 1305 AH/AD 1887-1888, by purchase [for 310 tomans]; Asghar 'Ali, 1305 AH/AD 1887, 1888, by gift [acquired for Asghar 'Ali by his father Husayn for 310 tomans, dated 1305 AH/AD 1887-1888, see fol. 1b]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Fakhr al-Din Hamzah ibn 'Ali Azari (died 866 AH/AD 1461-1462)
